column4: so, any suggestions why 1280x1024 isnt avaliable in the screen resolution menu even tho it is listed in xorg.conf?
- the refresh rate (likely) less so the video ram or driver wasn't picked right.
- It's a pain isn't it? - Don't worry it's worth it your video card just might be faster in linux than it ever was in windows.
- Sounds like fun gotta check it out.
